options.content:
# 📊 Hinweis

- Audio- und Video-Daten ohne Livestream-Nutzung, mit Ausnahme der Livestream-Tabelle.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  post_video_view_time
FROM facebookinsightsownposts
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY 1

WITH sumdata AS (
  SELECT
    TIMESTAMP(tmstp) as tmstp,
    CASE "$LRA"
    WHEN "NDR" THEN MAX(m_visits)
    ELSE SUM(DISTINCT m_visits)
    END
     as m_visits FROM
     `Piano.total_visits${feverCurveDataset:raw}`
  WHERE
  site_level2 = '${app_name}'
  AND page_chapter1 = "Alle Kapitel 1"
  AND page_chapter2 = "Alle Kapitel 2"
  AND sendungs_id = "Alle Sendungs-ID"
  AND $Zeitraum
  GROUP by tmstp
  ORDER BY tmstp DESC
  ${lim}
),
lagged_data AS (
  SELECT
    TIMESTAMP(tmstp) as time,
    m_visits - LAG(m_visits) OVER (
      ORDER BY
        tmstp
    ) as visits_past_5_minutes,
    LAG(m_visits) OVER (ORDER BY tmstp) as prev_m_visits,
    LAG(TIMESTAMP(tmstp)) OVER (ORDER BY tmstp) as pre_timestamp,
    m_visits
  FROM
    sumdata
    
),
min_time_from_base AS (
  -- This with statement will used in order to find out which is the last valid upload(e.g. the one with valid successor)
  SELECT MIN(pre_timestamp) min_time FROM lagged_data
  WHERE TIMESTAMP_DIFF(time, pre_timestamp, MINUTE) > 10
), 
max_time_from_base AS (
    -- THis with statement will be used if no gap exists
    SELECT MAX(time) as max_time FROM lagged_data
    WHERE TIMESTAMP_DIFF(time, pre_timestamp, MINUTE) = 10
),
cleaned_lagged_data AS (
  SELECT * from lagged_data 
  WHERE
  time <= (SELECT COALESCE(max_time_from_base.max_time, min_time_from_base.min_time )
  FROM max_time_from_base, min_time_from_base)
),
adjusted_lagged_data AS (
    SELECT
        time,
        pre_timestamp,
        -- Calculate time difference in minutes
        TIMESTAMP_DIFF(time, pre_timestamp, MINUTE) as time_diff,
        -- Adjust visits count based on time difference
           CASE
      WHEN FALSE AND TIMESTAMP_DIFF(time, pre_timestamp, MINUTE) > 10 OR TIMESTAMP_DIFF(time, pre_timestamp, MINUTE) < 10 AND "${Glaettung:text}" = "Glätten" THEN
        (m_visits - prev_m_visits) / TIMESTAMP_DIFF(time, pre_timestamp, MINUTE) * 10
      ELSE
        m_visits - prev_m_visits
        END as visits_past_5_minutes
    FROM
        cleaned_lagged_data
        WHERE TIMESTAMP_DIFF(time, pre_timestamp, MINUTE) >= 10
      ORDER BY time DESC
      ${lim}
),

daily_data AS (
  SELECT
     TIMESTAMP(date) as time,
    SUM(m_visits) as visits_past_5_minutes
  FROM
    `Piano.total_visits${feverCurveDataset:raw}`
  WHERE
  site_level2 = '${app_name}'
  AND page_chapter1 = "Alle Kapitel 1"
  AND page_chapter2 = "Alle Kapitel 2"
  AND sendungs_id = "Alle Sendungs-ID"
  AND $Zeitraum
  GROUP BY date
)

SELECT
    DATE_SUB(TIMESTAMP_ADD(time, INTERVAL 1 SECOND), INTERVAL 2 hour) as time,
  visits_past_5_minutes, "${type}" as type, "${Zeitraumlabels:text}" as refId,
     "${Glaettung:text}" as glaettung,
   "Zeitraum" as zeitraum
FROM
  ${dataset}
WHERE
  visits_past_5_minutes IS NOT NULL
  AND $Zeitraumfever 
ORDER BY
  time ASC
${lim}

WITH min_time AS (
      SELECT
        DATE_ADD(MIN(tmstp), INTERVAL 10 MINUTE) as min_tmstp,
        MAX(tmstp) as max_tmstp
        FROM
      (SELECT tmstp
      from
        `Piano.total_visits${feverCurveDataset:raw}`
      WHERE
       site_level2 = '${app_name}'
  AND page_chapter1 = "Alle Kapitel 1"
  AND page_chapter2 = "Alle Kapitel 2"
  AND sendungs_id = "Alle Sendungs-ID"
  AND $Zeitraum
  GROUP by tmstp
  ORDER BY tmstp DESC
  ${lim})
    ),
sumdata AS (
  SELECT
    TIMESTAMP(tmstp) as tmstp,
      CASE "$LRA"
    WHEN "NDR" THEN MAX(m_visits)
    ELSE SUM(DISTINCT m_visits)
    END
     as m_visits FROM
     `Piano.total_visits${feverCurveDataset:raw}`, min_time
  WHERE
  site_level2 = '${app_name}'
  AND page_chapter1 = "Alle Kapitel 1"
  AND page_chapter2 = "Alle Kapitel 2"
  AND sendungs_id = "Alle Sendungs-ID"
  AND $Vergleichszeitraum 
    AND tmstp <= min_time.min_tmstp
    AND  CASE "${Zeitraum:text}" WHEN "Gestern" THEN TRUE ELSE EXTRACT(HOUR from tmstp) <= (SELECT EXTRACT(HOUR FROM MAX(tmstp)) from  `Piano.total_visits${feverCurveDataset:raw}` WHERE $Zeitraum ) END
    AND    EXTRACT(date from tmstp) >= ${bq_comp_timeframe_start:doublequote} AND EXTRACT(date from tmstp) <= ${bq_comp_timeframe_end:doublequote}

  GROUP by tmstp
  ORDER BY tmstp DESC
),
lagged_data AS (
  SELECT
    TIMESTAMP(tmstp) as time,
    m_visits - LAG(m_visits) OVER (
      ORDER BY
        tmstp
    ) as visits_past_5_minutes,
    m_visits,
    LAG(m_visits) OVER (ORDER BY tmstp) as prev_m_visits,
    LAG(TIMESTAMP(tmstp)) OVER (ORDER BY tmstp) as pre_timestamp

  FROM
    sumdata
),
min_time_from_base AS (
  -- This with statement will used in order to find out which is the last valid upload(e.g. the one with valid successor)
  SELECT MIN(pre_timestamp) min_time FROM lagged_data
  WHERE TIMESTAMP_DIFF(time, pre_timestamp, MINUTE) > 10
), 
max_time_from_base AS (
    -- THis with statement will be used if no gap exists
    SELECT MAX(time) as max_time FROM lagged_data
    WHERE TIMESTAMP_DIFF(time, pre_timestamp, MINUTE) = 10
),
cleaned_lagged_data AS (
  SELECT * from lagged_data 
  WHERE
  time <= (SELECT COALESCE(min_time_from_base.min_time,max_time_from_base.max_time )
  FROM max_time_from_base, min_time_from_base)
),
adjusted_lagged_data AS (
    SELECT
        time,
        pre_timestamp,
        -- Calculate time difference in minutes
        TIMESTAMP_DIFF(time, pre_timestamp, MINUTE) as time_diff,
        -- Adjust visits count based on time difference
           CASE
      WHEN FALSE AND TIMESTAMP_DIFF(time, pre_timestamp, MINUTE) > 10 OR TIMESTAMP_DIFF(time, pre_timestamp, MINUTE) < 10 AND "${Glaettung:text}" = "Glätten" THEN
        (m_visits - prev_m_visits) / TIMESTAMP_DIFF(time, pre_timestamp, MINUTE) * 10
      ELSE
        m_visits - prev_m_visits
        END as visits_past_5_minutes
    FROM
        cleaned_lagged_data
        WHERE TIMESTAMP_DIFF(time, pre_timestamp, MINUTE) >= 10
),
daily_data AS (
  SELECT
     TIMESTAMP(date) as time,
    SUM(m_visits) as visits_past_5_minutes, 
  FROM
    `Piano.total_visits${feverCurveDataset:raw}`
  WHERE
    site_level2 = '${app_name}'
    AND page_chapter1 = "Alle Kapitel 1"
    AND page_chapter2 = "Alle Kapitel 2"
    AND sendungs_id = "Alle Sendungs-ID"
    AND $Vergleichszeitraum
    GROUP BY date
)

SELECT
  DATE_SUB(DATE_ADD(TIMESTAMP_ADD(time, INTERVAL 1 SECOND), INTERVAL ${time_shift} DAY), INTERVAL 2 HOUR) as time , 
  visits_past_5_minutes, "${type}" as type, 
   "${Vergleichszeitraumlabels:text}" as refId,
      "${Glaettung:text}" as glaettung,
   "Vergleichszeitraum" as zeitraum
FROM
  ${dataset}
WHERE
  visits_past_5_minutes IS NOT NULL
  AND $Vergleichszeitraumfever 
ORDER BY
  time ASC
${lim}

SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH('Visits')), 'Visits')
FROM(
SELECT 'Visits' as Visits
)

SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH('Page Views / Visits')), 'Page Views / Visits')
FROM(
SELECT 'Page Views / Visits' as pi_visits
)

SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH('Time spent / Visit in s')), 'Time spent / Visit in s')
FROM(
SELECT 'Time spent / Visit in s' as Audio_Videostarts
)

WITH adjusted_lagged_data AS (
  SELECT
     SUM(m_visits) as summe FROM
     `Piano.total_visits${feverCurveDataset:raw}`
  WHERE
  site_level2 = '${app_name}'
  AND page_chapter1 = "Alle Kapitel 1"
  AND page_chapter2 = "Alle Kapitel 2"
  AND sendungs_id = "Alle Sendungs-ID"
  AND date >= ${bq_timeframe_start:doublequote} AND date <= ${bq_timeframe_end:doublequote}
    GROUP BY site_level2, tmstp
  ORDER BY summe DESC
  LIMIT 1
),
daily_data AS (SELECT
  sum(m_visits) as summe
FROM
  `Piano.total_visits${dataset_zeitraum:raw}`
WHERE site_level2 = '${app_name}'
  AND page_chapter1 = "Alle Kapitel 1"
  AND page_chapter2 = "Alle Kapitel 2"
  AND sendungs_id = "Alle Sendungs-ID"
  AND date >= ${bq_timeframe_start:doublequote} AND date <= ${bq_timeframe_end:doublequote}
  )
SELECT * FROM ${dataset_not_fevercurve}

WITH adjusted_lagged_data AS (
  SELECT
    SUM(COALESCE(m_visits,0)) AS summe FROM
     `Piano.total_visits${feverCurveDataset:raw}`
  WHERE
  site_level2 = '${app_name}'
  AND page_chapter1 = "Alle Kapitel 1"
  AND page_chapter2 = "Alle Kapitel 2"
  AND sendungs_id = "Alle Sendungs-ID"
  AND date >= ${bq_comp_timeframe_start:doublequote} AND date <= ${bq_comp_timeframe_end:doublequote}
  AND tmstp <= "${comp_fever}"
    GROUP BY site_level2, tmstp
  ORDER BY summe DESC
  LIMIT 1
),
daily_data AS (SELECT
  SUM(COALESCE(m_visits,0)) AS summe
FROM
 `Piano.total_visits${dataset_vergleichs_zeitraum:raw}`
WHERE site_level2 = '${app_name}'
  AND page_chapter1 = "Alle Kapitel 1"
  AND page_chapter2 = "Alle Kapitel 2"
  AND sendungs_id = "Alle Sendungs-ID"
  AND date >= ${bq_comp_timeframe_start:doublequote} AND date <= ${bq_comp_timeframe_end:doublequote}
  )
SELECT * FROM ${dataset_not_fevercurve}

SELECT
  SUM(COALESCE(m_page_loads,0))/SUM(COALESCE(m_visits,1)) as PI_per_visit
FROM
  Piano.total_visits${dataset_zeitraum:raw}
WHERE site_level2 = '${app_name}'
  AND page_chapter1 = "Alle Kapitel 1"
  AND page_chapter2 = "Alle Kapitel 2"
  AND sendungs_id = "Alle Sendungs-ID"
  AND date >= ${bq_timeframe_start:doublequote} AND date <= ${bq_timeframe_end:doublequote}

WITH adjusted_lagged_data AS (
  SELECT
  MAX(COALESCE(m_page_loads,0))/MAX(COALESCE(m_visits,1)) as PI_per_visit,
FROM
  `Piano.total_visits${feverCurveDataset:raw}`
WHERE site_level2 = '${app_name}'
  AND page_chapter1 = "Alle Kapitel 1"
  AND page_chapter2 = "Alle Kapitel 2"
  AND sendungs_id = "Alle Sendungs-ID"
  AND date >= ${bq_comp_timeframe_start:doublequote} AND date <= ${bq_comp_timeframe_end:doublequote}
  AND tmstp <= "${comp_fever}"
),
daily_data AS (SELECT
  SUM(COALESCE(m_page_loads,0))/SUM(COALESCE(m_visits,1)) as PI_per_visit,
FROM
  Piano.total_visits${dataset_vergleichs_zeitraum:raw}
WHERE site_level2 = '${app_name}'
  AND page_chapter1 = "Alle Kapitel 1"
  AND page_chapter2 = "Alle Kapitel 2"
  AND sendungs_id = "Alle Sendungs-ID"
  AND date >= ${bq_comp_timeframe_start:doublequote} AND date <= ${bq_comp_timeframe_end:doublequote}
  )
SELECT * FROM ${dataset_not_fevercurve}

SELECT
  SUM(m_visits * m_time_spent_per_visits/1000) / SUM(m_visits) AS time_spent
FROM
  Piano.total_visits${dataset_zeitraum:raw}
WHERE site_level2 = '${app_name}'
  AND page_chapter1 = "Alle Kapitel 1"
  AND page_chapter2 = "Alle Kapitel 2"
  AND sendungs_id = "Alle Sendungs-ID"
  AND date >= ${bq_timeframe_start:doublequote} AND date <= ${bq_timeframe_end:doublequote}

WITH adjusted_lagged_data AS (
 SELECT
    MAX(m_visits * m_time_spent_per_visits/1000) / MAX(m_visits) AS time_spent
FROM
    `Piano.total_visits${feverCurveDataset:raw}`
WHERE site_level2 = '${app_name}'
  AND page_chapter1 = "Alle Kapitel 1"
  AND page_chapter2 = "Alle Kapitel 2"
  AND sendungs_id = "Alle Sendungs-ID"
  AND date >= ${bq_comp_timeframe_start:doublequote} AND date <= ${bq_comp_timeframe_end:doublequote}
  AND tmstp <= "${comp_fever}"
),
daily_data AS (SELECT
    SUM(m_visits * m_time_spent_per_visits/1000) / SUM(m_visits) AS time_spent
FROM
    Piano.total_visits${dataset_vergleichs_zeitraum:raw}
WHERE site_level2 = '${app_name}'
  AND page_chapter1 = "Alle Kapitel 1"
  AND page_chapter2 = "Alle Kapitel 2"
  AND sendungs_id = "Alle Sendungs-ID"
  AND date >= ${bq_comp_timeframe_start:doublequote} AND date <= ${bq_comp_timeframe_end:doublequote}
  )
SELECT * FROM ${dataset_not_fevercurve}

WITH past_value as(
WITH adjusted_lagged_data AS (
  SELECT
    SUM(COALESCE(m_visits,0)) AS summe FROM
     `Piano.total_visits${feverCurveDataset:raw}`
  WHERE
  site_level2 = '${app_name}'
  AND page_chapter1 = "Alle Kapitel 1"
  AND page_chapter2 = "Alle Kapitel 2"
  AND sendungs_id = "Alle Sendungs-ID"
  AND date >= ${bq_comp_timeframe_start:doublequote} AND date <= ${bq_comp_timeframe_end:doublequote}
  AND tmstp <= "${comp_fever}"
    GROUP BY site_level2, tmstp,date
  ORDER BY summe DESC
  LIMIT 1

),
daily_data AS (SELECT
  SUM(COALESCE(m_visits,0)) AS summe
FROM
  Piano.total_visits${dataset_vergleichs_zeitraum:raw}
WHERE site_level2 = '${app_name}'
  AND page_chapter1 = "Alle Kapitel 1"
  AND page_chapter2 = "Alle Kapitel 2"
  AND sendungs_id = "Alle Sendungs-ID"
  AND date >= ${bq_comp_timeframe_start:doublequote} AND date <= ${bq_comp_timeframe_end:doublequote}
  )
SELECT summe as past_sum FROM ${dataset_not_fevercurve}
), current_value AS (
  WITH adjusted_lagged_data AS (
  SELECT
     SUM(m_visits) as summe FROM
     `Piano.total_visits${feverCurveDataset:raw}`
  WHERE
  site_level2 = '${app_name}'
  AND page_chapter1 = "Alle Kapitel 1"
  AND page_chapter2 = "Alle Kapitel 2"
  AND sendungs_id = "Alle Sendungs-ID"
  AND date >= ${bq_timeframe_start:doublequote} AND date <= ${bq_timeframe_end:doublequote}
    GROUP BY site_level2, tmstp
  ORDER BY summe DESC
  LIMIT 1
),
daily_data AS (SELECT
  sum(m_visits) as summe
FROM
  Piano.total_visits${dataset_zeitraum:raw}
WHERE site_level2 = '${app_name}'
  AND page_chapter1 = "Alle Kapitel 1"
  AND page_chapter2 = "Alle Kapitel 2"
  AND sendungs_id = "Alle Sendungs-ID"
  AND date >= ${bq_timeframe_start:doublequote} AND date <= ${bq_timeframe_end:doublequote}
  )
SELECT summe as current_sum FROM ${dataset_not_fevercurve}
)

SELECT ((current_sum-past_sum)/past_sum)*100 FROM current_value,past_value as relative_difference

WITH past_value as(
WITH adjusted_lagged_data AS (
  SELECT
  MAX(COALESCE(m_page_loads,0))/MAX(COALESCE(m_visits,1)) as summe,
FROM
  `Piano.total_visits${feverCurveDataset:raw}`
WHERE site_level2 = '${app_name}'
  AND page_chapter1 = "Alle Kapitel 1"
  AND page_chapter2 = "Alle Kapitel 2"
  AND sendungs_id = "Alle Sendungs-ID"
  AND date >= ${bq_comp_timeframe_start:doublequote} AND date <= ${bq_comp_timeframe_end:doublequote}
  AND tmstp <= "${comp_fever}"
),
daily_data AS (SELECT
  SUM(COALESCE(m_page_loads,0))/SUM(COALESCE(m_visits,1)) as summe,
FROM
    `Piano.total_visits${dataset_vergleichs_zeitraum:raw}`
WHERE site_level2 = '${app_name}'
  AND page_chapter1 = "Alle Kapitel 1"
  AND page_chapter2 = "Alle Kapitel 2"
  AND sendungs_id = "Alle Sendungs-ID"
  AND date >= ${bq_comp_timeframe_start:doublequote} AND date <= ${bq_comp_timeframe_end:doublequote}
  )
SELECT summe as past_sum FROM ${dataset_not_fevercurve}), current_value AS (
SELECT
  SUM(COALESCE(m_page_loads,0))/SUM(COALESCE(m_visits,1)) as current_sum,
FROM
    `Piano.total_visits${dataset_zeitraum:raw}`
WHERE site_level2 = '${app_name}'
  AND page_chapter1 = "Alle Kapitel 1"
  AND page_chapter2 = "Alle Kapitel 2"
  AND sendungs_id = "Alle Sendungs-ID"
  AND date >= ${bq_timeframe_start:doublequote} AND date <= ${bq_timeframe_end:doublequote}
  )
SELECT ((current_sum-past_sum)/past_sum)*100 FROM current_value,past_value as relative_difference

WITH past_value as(
WITH adjusted_lagged_data AS (
 SELECT
    MAX(m_visits * m_time_spent_per_visits/1000) / MAX(m_visits) AS summe
FROM
    `Piano.total_visits${feverCurveDataset:raw}`
WHERE site_level2 = '${app_name}'
  AND page_chapter1 = "Alle Kapitel 1"
  AND page_chapter2 = "Alle Kapitel 2"
  AND sendungs_id = "Alle Sendungs-ID"
  AND date >= ${bq_comp_timeframe_start:doublequote} AND date <= ${bq_comp_timeframe_end:doublequote}
  AND tmstp <= "${comp_fever}"
),
daily_data AS (SELECT
    SUM(m_visits * m_time_spent_per_visits/1000) / SUM(m_visits) AS summe
FROM
      `Piano.total_visits${dataset_vergleichs_zeitraum:raw}`
WHERE site_level2 = '${app_name}'
  AND page_chapter1 = "Alle Kapitel 1"
  AND page_chapter2 = "Alle Kapitel 2"
  AND sendungs_id = "Alle Sendungs-ID"
  AND date >= ${bq_comp_timeframe_start:doublequote} AND date <= ${bq_comp_timeframe_end:doublequote}
  )
SELECT summe as past_sum FROM ${dataset_not_fevercurve}), current_value AS (
SELECT 
   SUM(m_visits * m_time_spent_per_visits/1000) / SUM(m_visits) AS current_sum,
FROM 
    `Piano.total_visits${dataset_zeitraum:raw}`
WHERE site_level2 = "${app_name}"
  AND page_chapter1 = "Alle Kapitel 1"
  AND page_chapter2 = "Alle Kapitel 2"
  AND sendungs_id = "Alle Sendungs-ID"
AND date >= ${bq_timeframe_start:doublequote} AND date <= ${bq_timeframe_end:doublequote}
)
SELECT ((current_sum-past_sum)/past_sum)*100 FROM current_value,past_value as relative_difference

-- cache version
SELECT
  publishing_date as Datum,
  content_titel as Artikel,
  sum(m_visits) as Visits,
  sum(m_page_loads) as page_views,
  content_id_sophora,
  '' as Type
FROM
  (
    SELECT
      --publishing_date,
      FIRST_VALUE(publishing_date) OVER (PARTITION BY CASE uuid WHEN "N/A" THEN content_id_sophora ELSE uuid END ORDER BY publishing_date DESC) as publishing_date, 
      FIRST_VALUE(content_id_sophora) OVER (PARTITION BY CASE uuid WHEN "N/A" THEN content_id_sophora ELSE uuid END ORDER BY publishing_date DESC) as content_id_sophora, 
      m_visits,
      m_page_loads,
      FIRST_VALUE(content_titel) OVER (PARTITION BY CASE uuid WHEN "N/A" THEN content_id_sophora ELSE uuid END ORDER BY publishing_date DESC) as content_titel
    FROM
      $table
    WHERE
      site_level2 = '${app_name}'
      AND content_id_sophora NOT LIKE '%index%'
      AND content_id_sophora NOT LIKE '%N/A%'
      AND (
        CASE 
            WHEN "$LRA" = 'NDR' THEN
                content_titel NOT LIKE '%Video Livestream%'
            AND content_titel NOT LIKE '%Startteaser%'
            AND content_titel NOT LIKE '%startteaser%'
            AND content_titel NOT LIKE '%-Anmelden%'
            AND content_titel NOT LIKE '%_Start'
            AND content_titel != 'Anmelden'
            AND content_titel != 'Jetzt läuft'
        ELSE
          TRUE
        END)
      AND date >= ${bq_timeframe_start:doublequote} AND date <= ${bq_timeframe_end:doublequote}
  )
GROUP BY
  content_id_sophora,
  content_titel,
  publishing_date
ORDER BY
  3 DESC
LIMIT
  100

SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH('Audio')), '')
FROM(
SELECT 'Audio' as Audio
)

SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH('Wiedergaben')), 'Wiedergaben')
FROM(
SELECT 'Wiedergaben' as Wiedergaben
)

SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH('Wiedergaberate')), 'Wiedergaberate')
FROM(
SELECT 'Wiedergaberate' as Wiedergaberate
)

SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH('Video')), 'Video')
FROM(
SELECT 'Video' as Video
)

SELECT 
  SUM(COALESCE(m_playbutton, m_av_playbacks, 0)) as summe
FROM  
  `${dataset_zeitraum_av:raw}`
  WHERE 
$av_filter  
  AND date >= ${bq_timeframe_start:doublequote} AND date <= ${bq_timeframe_end:doublequote}
AND $av_app_condition_video

SELECT 
  SUM(COALESCE(m_playbutton,m_av_playbacks,0)) as summe
FROM 
 `${dataset_vergleichs_zeitraum_av:raw}` WHERE 
$av_filter 
AND date >= ${bq_comp_timeframe_start:doublequote} AND date <= ${bq_comp_timeframe_end:doublequote}
AND $av_app_condition_video

WITH current_value AS (
  SELECT 
  SUM(COALESCE(m_playbutton,m_av_playbacks,0)) as current_sum
FROM  
 `${dataset_zeitraum_av:raw}`
WHERE 
$av_filter 
AND date >= ${bq_timeframe_start:doublequote} AND date <= ${bq_timeframe_end:doublequote}
AND ($av_app_condition_video)
), past_value AS (
  SELECT 
  SUM(COALESCE(m_playbutton,m_av_playbacks,0)) as past_sum
FROM 
`${dataset_vergleichs_zeitraum_av:raw}`WHERE 
$av_filter 
AND date >= ${bq_comp_timeframe_start:doublequote} AND date <= ${bq_comp_timeframe_end:doublequote} 
AND ($av_app_condition_video)
)
SELECT (SAFE_DIVIDE((current_sum-past_sum),past_sum))*100 FROM current_value,past_value as relative_difference

SELECT
  SAFE_DIVIDE(SUM(m_av_playbacks * m_av_average_playback_completion_rate), SUM(m_av_playbacks)) as summe
FROM 
 `${dataset_zeitraum_av:raw}`
WHERE 
$av_filter 
AND date >= ${bq_timeframe_start:doublequote} AND date <= ${bq_timeframe_end:doublequote}
AND ($av_app_condition_video)
AND bi_av_broadcasting_type NOT LIKE '%Live%'
AND bi_av_broadcasting_type NOT LIKE '%live%'

SELECT
  SAFE_DIVIDE(SUM(m_av_playbacks * m_av_average_playback_completion_rate), SUM(m_av_playbacks)) as summe
  --AVG(m_av_average_playback_completion_rate) as summe
  -- AVG(m_av_playbacks)/AVG(av_content_duration) as summe
  --SUM(COALESCE(m_av_playbacks,0))/SUM(COALESCE(av_content_duration,0)) as summe
FROM 
   `${dataset_vergleichs_zeitraum_av:raw}`
WHERE 
$av_filter 
AND date >= ${bq_comp_timeframe_start:doublequote} AND date <= ${bq_comp_timeframe_end:doublequote} 
AND ($av_app_condition_video)
AND bi_av_broadcasting_type NOT LIKE '%Live%'
AND bi_av_broadcasting_type NOT LIKE '%live%'

WITH current_value AS (
  SELECT
  SAFE_DIVIDE(SUM(m_av_playbacks * m_av_average_playback_completion_rate), SUM(m_av_playbacks)) as current_sum
  -- AVG(m_av_average_playback_completion_rate) as current_sum
   -- AVG(m_av_playbacks)/AVG(av_content_duration) as summe
  --SUM(COALESCE(m_av_playbacks,0))/SUM(COALESCE(av_content_duration,0)) as summe
FROM 
 `${dataset_zeitraum_av:raw}`WHERE 
$av_filter 
AND date >= ${bq_timeframe_start:doublequote} AND date <= ${bq_timeframe_end:doublequote}
AND ($av_app_condition_video)
), past_value AS (
  SELECT
  SAFE_DIVIDE(SUM(m_av_playbacks * m_av_average_playback_completion_rate), SUM(m_av_playbacks)) as past_sum
  --AVG(m_av_average_playback_completion_rate) as past_sum
   -- AVG(m_av_playbacks)/AVG(av_content_duration) as summe
  --SUM(COALESCE(m_av_playbacks,0))/SUM(COALESCE(av_content_duration,0)) as summe
FROM 
  `${dataset_vergleichs_zeitraum_av:raw}`
WHERE 
$av_filter 
AND date >= ${bq_comp_timeframe_start:doublequote} AND date <= ${bq_comp_timeframe_end:doublequote} 
AND ($av_app_condition_video)
AND bi_av_broadcasting_type NOT LIKE '%Live%'
AND bi_av_broadcasting_type NOT LIKE '%live%'
)
SELECT (SAFE_DIVIDE((current_sum-past_sum),past_sum))*100 FROM current_value,past_value as relative_difference

SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH('Audio')), 'Audio')
FROM(
SELECT 'Audio' as Audio
)

SELECT 
  SUM(COALESCE(m_playbutton,m_av_playbacks,0)) as summe
FROM 
   `${dataset_zeitraum_av:raw}`
WHERE 
$av_filter 
AND date >= ${bq_timeframe_start:doublequote} AND date <= ${bq_timeframe_end:doublequote}
AND ($av_app_condition_audio)

SELECT 
  SUM(COALESCE(m_playbutton,m_av_playbacks,0)) as summe
FROM 
`${dataset_vergleichs_zeitraum_av:raw}`WHERE 
$av_filter 
AND date >= ${bq_comp_timeframe_start:doublequote} AND date <= ${bq_comp_timeframe_end:doublequote}
AND ($av_app_condition_audio)

WITH current_value AS (
  SELECT 
  SUM(COALESCE(m_playbutton,m_av_playbacks,0)) as current_sum
FROM 
   `${dataset_zeitraum_av:raw}`
WHERE 
$av_filter
AND date >= ${bq_timeframe_start:doublequote} AND date <= ${bq_timeframe_end:doublequote}
AND ($av_app_condition_audio)
), past_value AS (
  SELECT 
  SUM(COALESCE(m_playbutton,m_av_playbacks,0)) as past_sum
FROM 
   `${dataset_vergleichs_zeitraum_av:raw}`
WHERE 
$av_filter 
AND date >= ${bq_comp_timeframe_start:doublequote} AND date <= ${bq_comp_timeframe_end:doublequote} 
AND ($av_app_condition_audio)
)
SELECT (SAFE_DIVIDE((current_sum-past_sum),past_sum))*100 FROM current_value,past_value as relative_difference

SELECT 
  --AVG(m_av_average_playback_completion_rate) as summe
  SAFE_DIVIDE(SUM(m_av_playbacks * m_av_average_playback_completion_rate), SUM(m_av_playbacks)) as summe
FROM 
 `${dataset_zeitraum_av:raw}`
WHERE 
$av_filter 
AND date >= ${bq_timeframe_start:doublequote} AND date <= ${bq_timeframe_end:doublequote}
AND ($av_app_condition_audio)

SELECT 
  SAFE_DIVIDE(SUM(m_av_playbacks * m_av_average_playback_completion_rate), SUM(m_av_playbacks)) as summe
FROM 
`${dataset_vergleichs_zeitraum_av:raw}`
WHERE 
$av_filter 
AND date >= ${bq_comp_timeframe_start:doublequote} AND date <= ${bq_comp_timeframe_end:doublequote}
AND ($av_app_condition_audio)

WITH current_value AS (
  SELECT
  SAFE_DIVIDE(SUM(m_av_playbacks * m_av_average_playback_completion_rate), SUM(m_av_playbacks)) as current_sum
  -- AVG(m_av_average_playback_completion_rate) as current_sum
   -- AVG(m_av_playbacks)/AVG(av_content_duration) as summe
  --SUM(COALESCE(m_av_playbacks,0))/SUM(COALESCE(av_content_duration,0)) as summe
FROM 
  `${dataset_zeitraum_av:raw}`
WHERE 
$av_filter 
AND date >= ${bq_timeframe_start:doublequote} AND date <= ${bq_timeframe_end:doublequote}
AND ($av_app_condition_audio)
), past_value AS (
  SELECT
  SAFE_DIVIDE(SUM(m_av_playbacks * m_av_average_playback_completion_rate), SUM(m_av_playbacks)) as past_sum
  --AVG(m_av_average_playback_completion_rate) as past_sum
   -- AVG(m_av_playbacks)/AVG(av_content_duration) as summe
  --SUM(COALESCE(m_av_playbacks,0))/SUM(COALESCE(av_content_duration,0)) as summe
FROM 
  `${dataset_vergleichs_zeitraum_av:raw}`
WHERE 
$av_filter 
AND date >= ${bq_comp_timeframe_start:doublequote} AND date <= ${bq_comp_timeframe_end:doublequote} 
AND ($av_app_condition_audio)
)
SELECT (SAFE_DIVIDE((current_sum-past_sum),past_sum))*100 FROM current_value,past_value as relative_difference

SELECT 
bi_av_publication_date,
bi_av_content, bi_av_content_id,
bi_av_url as url,
sum(m_av_playbacks) as wiedergabe, 
CONCAT(CONCAT(

  CASE WHEN LENGTH(CAST(DIV(av_content_duration,60) AS String))<2 THEN CONCAT("0",CAST(DIV(av_content_duration,60) AS String)) ELSE CAST(DIV(av_content_duration,60) AS String)  END ,

  ":",CASE WHEN LENGTH(CAST(MOD(av_content_duration,60) AS String))<2 THEN CONCAT("0",CAST(MOD(av_content_duration,60) AS String)) ELSE CAST(MOD(av_content_duration,60) AS String)  END)," Min") as av_content_duration,
CASE "$LRA"
WHEN "NDR" THEN NULL
ELSE 100*SUM(m_av_playbacks * m_av_average_playback_completion_rate) / SUM(m_av_playbacks) END as wiedergaberate,
av_content_type,
bi_av_broadcasting_type,
--device_type,
FROM
(
SELECT
FIRST_VALUE($av_pub_date) OVER (PARTITION BY bi_av_content_id ORDER BY COALESCE(m_playbutton, m_av_playbacks) DESC) as bi_av_publication_date,  
COALESCE(m_playbutton,m_av_playbacks) as m_av_playbacks, 
CASE  
      WHEN av_content_duration is NULL THEN NULL
      ELSE CAST((av_content_duration/1000) AS INT) END av_content_duration,
--CAST((av_content_duration/1000) AS INT) as av_content_duration,  
m_av_average_playback_completion_rate, 
COALESCE(content_typ, av_content_type) as av_content_type, COALESCE(content_id_sophora, bi_av_content_id) as bi_av_content_id,  
COALESCE(objekt_typ ,bi_av_broadcasting_type) as bi_av_broadcasting_type ,  
FIRST_VALUE(bi_av_url) OVER (PARTITION BY $av_content_id ORDER BY COALESCE(m_playbutton, m_av_playbacks) DESC) as bi_av_url,  

--device_type,
FIRST_VALUE($av_content) OVER (PARTITION BY COALESCE(content_id_sophora,bi_av_content_id) ORDER BY COALESCE(m_playbutton,m_av_playbacks) DESC) as bi_av_content  
FROM 
`${dataset_zeitraum_av:raw}`--`Piano.av${dataset_zeitraum:raw}` 
WHERE $av_filter 
AND COALESCE(content_id_sophora, bi_av_content_id) NOT LIKE '%index%'  
AND COALESCE(objekt_typ, bi_av_broadcasting_type) IN $av_on_demand_filter  
AND date >= ${bq_timeframe_start:doublequote} AND date <= ${bq_timeframe_end:doublequote})  
WHERE m_av_playbacks > 0
GROUP BY bi_av_publication_date,bi_av_content,av_content_duration,av_content_type,bi_av_content_id, bi_av_broadcasting_type, bi_av_url
--,device_type 
ORDER BY 5 DESC
Limit 100

panels.title: Top 100 Web Audios & Videos on Demand

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
bi_av_publication_date,
bi_av_content, bi_av_content_id,
bi_av_url as url,
sum(m_av_playbacks) as wiedergabe,
av_content_type,
bi_av_broadcasting_type,
FROM
(
SELECT
FIRST_VALUE($av_pub_date) OVER (PARTITION BY $av_content_id ORDER BY COALESCE(m_playbutton, m_av_playbacks) DESC) as bi_av_publication_date, 
COALESCE(m_playbutton,m_av_playbacks) as m_av_playbacks,
COALESCE(content_typ, av_content_type) as av_content_type, $av_content_id as bi_av_content_id,
bi_av_broadcasting_type, 
FIRST_VALUE(bi_av_url) OVER (PARTITION BY $av_content ORDER BY COALESCE(m_playbutton, m_av_playbacks) DESC) as bi_av_url, 

--device_type,
FIRST_VALUE($av_content) OVER (PARTITION BY $av_content_id ORDER BY COALESCE(m_playbutton, m_av_playbacks) DESC) as bi_av_content, 
FROM 
`${dataset_zeitraum_av:raw}`--`Piano.av${dataset_zeitraum:raw}`
WHERE $av_filter 
AND $av_content_id NOT LIKE '%index%'
AND COALESCE(objekt_typ, bi_av_broadcasting_type) IN $av_live_stream_filter
AND date >= ${bq_timeframe_start:doublequote} AND date <= ${bq_timeframe_end:doublequote})
WHERE m_av_playbacks > 0
GROUP BY bi_av_publication_date,bi_av_content,
av_content_type,bi_av_content_id, bi_av_broadcasting_type, bi_av_url
--,device_type 
ORDER BY 5 DESC
Limit 100

-- cache version
SELECT 
  SUM(m_visits), os_group 
FROM 
  ${distro_table:raw}
WHERE site_level2 = "${app_name}"
  AND page_chapter1 = "Alle Kapitel 1"
  AND page_chapter2 = "Alle Kapitel 2"
  AND sendungs_id = "Alle Sendungs-ID"
  AND date >= ${bq_timeframe_start:doublequote} AND date <= ${bq_timeframe_end:doublequote}
  AND device_type NOT LIKE '%N/A%'
GROUP BY os_group
ORDER BY 1 DESC

SELECT
device_type,
SUM(m_visits) as visits
FROM
  ${distro_table:raw}
WHERE site_level2 = "${app_name}"
  AND page_chapter1 = "Alle Kapitel 1"
  AND page_chapter2 = "Alle Kapitel 2"
  AND sendungs_id = "Alle Sendungs-ID"
  AND date >= ${bq_timeframe_start:doublequote} AND date <= ${bq_timeframe_end:doublequote} 
  AND device_type NOT LIKE '%N/A%'
GROUP BY device_type 
ORDER BY visits DESC 
LIMIT 10

query.rawSql:
SELECT 
  CASE "${Zeitraum:text}"
  WHEN "Letzte Stunde" THEN "Vorletzte Stunde"
  WHEN "Heute" THEN "Gestern"
  WHEN "Heute -7d" THEN "Heute vor 7 Tagen"
  WHEN "Gestern" THEN "Gestern vor 7 Tagen"
  WHEN "Letztes Wochenende" THEN "Vorletztes Wochenende"
  WHEN "Letzte 7 Tage" THEN "Letzte 8-14 Tage"
  WHEN "Letzte 30 Tage" THEN "Letzte 31-60 Tage"
  END

SELECT 
  CASE "${Zeitraum:text}"
  WHEN "Letzte Stunde" THEN "date = CURRENT_DATE()"
  WHEN "Heute" THEN "date = DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY)"
  WHEN "Heute -7d" THEN "date = DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY)"
  WHEN "Gestern" THEN "EXTRACT(DATE from tmstp) = DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 8 DAY) AND date = DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 8 DAY)"
  WHEN "Letztes Wochenende" THEN "date >= (SELECT DATE_SUB(DATE(TIMESTAMP_TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), WEEK(MONDAY)) - INTERVAL 2 DAY),INTERVAL 7 DAY) as saturday) AND date <= (SELECT DATE_SUB(DATE(TIMESTAMP_TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), WEEK(MONDAY)) - INTERVAL 1 DAY), INTERVAL 7 DAY) as sunday)"
  WHEN "Letzte 7 Tage" THEN "date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 14 DAY) AND date < DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY)"
  WHEN "Letzte 30 Tage" THEN "date >=  DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL  60 DAY) AND date < DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL  30 DAY)"
  END

SELECT distinct LRA FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.Profiles_App`
ORDER BY (
  CASE
    WHEN REGEXP_CONTAINS(LOWER("${__user.email}"), LOWER(LRA))
    THEN 1
    ELSE 0
  END
) DESC

SELECT CAST(time_shift AS STRING) FROM (
SELECT
CASE
WHEN "${Zeitraum:text}" = "Letzte Stunde" THEN 0
WHEN "${Zeitraum:text}" = "Heute" THEN 1
WHEN "${Zeitraum:text}" = "Gestern" THEN 7
WHEN "${Zeitraum:text}" = "Letztes Wochenende" THEN 7
WHEN CONTAINS_SUBSTR("${Zeitraum:text}", "7") THEN 7
WHEN CONTAINS_SUBSTR("${Zeitraum:text}", "30") THEN 30 END AS time_shift)

SELECT distinct app FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.Profiles_App`
WHERE LRA = "$LRA"
ORDER BY app ASC

SELECT
  CASE
    WHEN "$LRA" = 'MDR' THEN
      (SELECT distinct product_app_name FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.Profiles_App` WHERE app = "$App")
    WHEN "$LRA" = 'NDR' THEN 
      (SELECT distinct site_level2 FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.Profiles_App` WHERE app = "$App")
  END

list.name: Zeitraum

options.value: CAST(tmstp AS DATE) = CURRENT_DATE() AND date = CURRENT_DATE()

date >= (SELECT saturday FROM(SELECT DATE(TIMESTAMP_TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(),WEEK(MONDAY)) - INTERVAL 2 DAY) as saturday)) AND date <= (SELECT DATE(TIMESTAMP_TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(),WEEK(MONDAY)) - INTERVAL 1 DAY) as sunday)
date >=  DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL  7 DAY) AND date < CURRENT_DATE()
date >=  DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL  30 DAY) AND date < CURRENT_DATE()

list.query: Letzte Stunde : CAST(tmstp AS DATE) = CURRENT_DATE() AND date = CURRENT_DATE(), Heute : date = CURRENT_DATE(),  Heute -7d : date  = CURRENT_DATE(), Gestern : date = DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE()\, INTERVAL  1 DAY), Letztes Wochenende :  date >= (SELECT saturday FROM(SELECT DATE(TIMESTAMP_TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP()\,WEEK(MONDAY)) - INTERVAL 2 DAY) as saturday)) AND date <= (SELECT DATE(TIMESTAMP_TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP()\,WEEK(MONDAY)) - INTERVAL 1 DAY) as sunday), Letzte 7 Tage : date >=  DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE()\, INTERVAL  7 DAY) AND date < CURRENT_DATE(), Letzte 30 Tage : date >=  DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE()\, INTERVAL  30 DAY) AND date < CURRENT_DATE()

query.rawSql:
SELECT 
  CASE "${Zeitraum:text}"
  WHEN "Letzte Stunde" THEN "ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.articles_joined_last_hour"
  WHEN "Heute" THEN "ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.articles_joined_today"
  WHEN "Heute -7d" THEN "ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.articles_joined_today"
  ELSE "ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.articles_joined_daily"
END

SELECT
  CASE 
    WHEN "${Zeitraum:text}" = "Letzte Stunde" THEN FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m-%d', today)
    WHEN "${Zeitraum:text}" = "Heute" THEN FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m-%d', yesterday)
    WHEN "${Zeitraum:text}" = "Heute -7d" THEN FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m-%d', DATE_SUB(today, INTERVAL 7 DAY))
    WHEN "${Zeitraum:text}" = "Gestern" THEN FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m-%d', DATE_SUB(yesterday, INTERVAL 7 DAY))
    WHEN "${Zeitraum:text}" = "Letztes Wochenende" THEN FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m-%d', DATE_SUB(last_sunday, INTERVAL 7 DAY))
    WHEN "${Zeitraum:text}" = "Letzte 7 Tage" THEN FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m-%d', DATE_SUB(interval_7_day, INTERVAL 1 DAY))
    WHEN "${Zeitraum:text}" = "Letzte 30 Tage" THEN FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m-%d', DATE_SUB(interval_30_day, INTERVAL 1 DAY))
    ELSE FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m-%d', today)
  END AS relevant_value
FROM `grafana.current_date`

SELECT
  CASE 
    WHEN "${Zeitraum:text}" = "Letzte Stunde" THEN FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m-%d', today)
    WHEN "${Zeitraum:text}" = "Heute" THEN FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m-%d', yesterday)
    WHEN "${Zeitraum:text}" = "Heute -7d" THEN FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m-%d', DATE_SUB(today, INTERVAL 7 DAY))
    WHEN "${Zeitraum:text}" = "Gestern" THEN FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m-%d', DATE_SUB(yesterday, INTERVAL 7 DAY))
    WHEN "${Zeitraum:text}" = "Letztes Wochenende" THEN FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m-%d', DATE_SUB(last_saturday, INTERVAL 7 DAY))
    WHEN "${Zeitraum:text}" = "Letzte 7 Tage" THEN FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m-%d', DATE_SUB(interval_7_day, INTERVAL 7 DAY))
    WHEN "${Zeitraum:text}" = "Letzte 30 Tage" THEN FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m-%d', DATE_SUB(interval_30_day, INTERVAL 30 DAY))
    ELSE FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m-%d', today)
  END AS relevant_value
FROM `grafana.current_date`

SELECT
  CASE 
    WHEN "${Zeitraum:text}" = "Letzte Stunde" THEN FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m-%d', today)
    WHEN "${Zeitraum:text}" = "Heute" THEN FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m-%d', today)
    WHEN "${Zeitraum:text}" = "Heute -7d" THEN FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m-%d', today)
    WHEN "${Zeitraum:text}" = "Gestern" THEN FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m-%d', yesterday)
    WHEN "${Zeitraum:text}" = "Letztes Wochenende" THEN FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m-%d', last_saturday)
    WHEN "${Zeitraum:text}" = "Letzte 7 Tage" THEN FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m-%d', interval_7_day)
    WHEN "${Zeitraum:text}" = "Letzte 30 Tage" THEN FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m-%d', interval_30_day)
    ELSE FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m-%d', today)
  END AS relevant_value
FROM `grafana.current_date`

SELECT
  CASE 
    WHEN "${Zeitraum:text}" = "Letzte Stunde" THEN FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m-%d', today)
    WHEN "${Zeitraum:text}" = "Heute" THEN FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m-%d', today)
    WHEN "${Zeitraum:text}" = "Heute -7d" THEN FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m-%d', today)
    WHEN "${Zeitraum:text}" = "Gestern" THEN FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m-%d', yesterday)
    WHEN "${Zeitraum:text}" = "Letztes Wochenende" THEN FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m-%d', last_sunday)
    WHEN "${Zeitraum:text}" = "Letzte 7 Tage" THEN FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m-%d', DATE_SUB(today, INTERVAL 1 DAY))
    WHEN "${Zeitraum:text}" = "Letzte 30 Tage" THEN FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m-%d', DATE_SUB(today, INTERVAL 1 DAY))
    ELSE FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m-%d', today)
  END AS relevant_value
FROM `grafana.current_date`

SELECT 
  CASE "${Zeitraum:text}"
  WHEN "Heute -7d" THEN "Heute"
  ELSE "${Zeitraum:text}"
  END

SELECT 
CASE "${Zeitraum:text}"
  WHEN "Heute" THEN  "_today_append"
  WHEN "Heute -7d" THEN  "_today_append"
  WHEN "Gestern" THEN "_today_append"
  WHEN "Letzte Stunde" THEN "_today_append"
  ELSE ""
  END

SELECT 
CASE "${Zeitraum:text}"
  WHEN "Heute" THEN  "adjusted_lagged_data"
  WHEN "Heute -7d" THEN  "adjusted_lagged_data"
  WHEN "Letzte Stunde" THEN "adjusted_lagged_data"
  WHEN "Gestern" THEN "adjusted_lagged_data"
  ELSE "daily_data"
  END

SELECT 
CASE "${Zeitraum:text}"
  WHEN "Heute" THEN  "line"
  WHEN "Heute -7d" THEN  "line"
  WHEN "Gestern" THEN  "line"
  WHEN "Letzte Stunde" THEN "line"
  ELSE "bar"
  END

SELECT 
CASE "${Zeitraum:text}"
  WHEN "Heute" THEN  ""
  WHEN "Gestern" THEN  ""
  WHEN "Letzte Stunde" THEN "LIMIT 8"
  ELSE ""
  END

SELECT
  CASE 
    --WHEN "${Zeitraum:text}" = "Letzte Stunde" THEN CURRENT_DATETIME("Europe/Berlin")
    WHEN "${Zeitraum:text}" = "Heute" THEN  DATETIME_SUB(CURRENT_DATETIME("Europe/Berlin"), INTERVAL 1 DAY)
    WHEN "${Zeitraum:text}" = "Heute -7d" THEN  DATETIME_SUB(CURRENT_DATETIME("Europe/Berlin"), INTERVAL 7 DAY)
    ELSE CURRENT_DATETIME("Europe/Berlin")
  END AS relevant_value
FROM `grafana.current_date`

SELECT 
CASE "${Zeitraum:text}"
  WHEN "Heute" THEN  "adjusted_lagged_data"
  WHEN "Heute -7d" THEN "adjusted_lagged_data"
  WHEN "Letzte Stunde" THEN "daily_data"
  ELSE "daily_data"
  END

SELECT 
CASE "${Zeitraum:text}"
WHEN "Heute" THEN FORMAT_DATE('%H:%M', TIMESTAMP_ADD(MAX(tmstp), INTERVAL 1 SECOND))
WHEN "Heute -7d" THEN FORMAT_DATE('%H:%M', TIMESTAMP_ADD(MAX(tmstp), INTERVAL 1 SECOND))
ELSE "" END
FROM Piano.total_visits_today_append

SELECT 
CASE "${Zeitraum:text}"
  WHEN "Heute" THEN  "Piano.articles_joined_today"
  WHEN "Heute -7d" THEN  "Piano.articles_joined"
  WHEN "Letzte Stunde" THEN "Piano.articles_joined_last_hour"
  ELSE "Piano.articles_joined_daily"
  END

SELECT 
CASE "${Zeitraum:text}"
  WHEN "Heute" THEN  "Piano.distro_joined_today"
  WHEN "Heute -7d" THEN  "Piano.distro_joined_today"
  WHEN "Letzte Stunde" THEN "Piano.distro_joined_last_hour"
  ELSE "Piano.distro_joined_daily"
  END

current.text: EXTRACT(date from time) = DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY)
current.value: EXTRACT(date from time) = DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY)

query.rawSql:
SELECT 
  CASE "${Zeitraum:text}"
   WHEN "Letzte Stunde" THEN "DATETIME_DIFF((SELECT min_tmstp FROM min_time), DATETIME(time), MINUTE) <=70 AND DATETIME(time) <= ((SELECT min_tmstp FROM min_time))"
  WHEN "Heute" THEN " EXTRACT(date from time) = DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY)"
  WHEN "Heute -7d" THEN " EXTRACT(date from time) = DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY)"
  WHEN "Gestern" THEN "EXTRACT(DATE from time) = DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 8 DAY) AND EXTRACT(date from time) = DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 8 DAY)"
  WHEN "Letztes Wochenende" THEN " EXTRACT(date from time) >= (SELECT DATE_SUB(DATE(TIMESTAMP_TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), WEEK(MONDAY)) - INTERVAL 2 DAY),INTERVAL 7 DAY) as saturday) AND EXTRACT(date from time) <= (SELECT DATE_SUB(DATE(TIMESTAMP_TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), WEEK(MONDAY)) - INTERVAL 1 DAY), INTERVAL 7 DAY) as sunday)"
  WHEN "Letzte 7 Tage" THEN " EXTRACT(date from time) >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 14 DAY) AND EXTRACT(date from time) < DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY)"
  WHEN "Letzte 30 Tage" THEN " EXTRACT(date from time) >=  DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL  60 DAY) AND EXTRACT(date from time) < DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL  30 DAY)"
  END

current.text: EXTRACT(date from time) = DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 0 DAY)
current.value: EXTRACT(date from time) = DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 0 DAY)

query.rawSql:
SELECT 
  CASE "${Zeitraum:text}"
  WHEN "Letzte Stunde" THEN " EXTRACT(date from time) = DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 0 DAY)"
  WHEN "Heute" THEN " EXTRACT(date from time) = DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 0 DAY)"
  WHEN "Heute -7d" THEN " EXTRACT(date from time) = DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 0 DAY)"
  WHEN "Gestern" THEN "EXTRACT(DATE from time) = DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY) AND EXTRACT(date from time) = DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY)"
  WHEN "Letztes Wochenende" THEN " EXTRACT(date from time) >= (SELECT DATE_SUB(DATE(TIMESTAMP_TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), WEEK(MONDAY)) - INTERVAL 2 DAY),INTERVAL 0 DAY) as saturday) AND EXTRACT(date from time) <= (SELECT DATE_SUB(DATE(TIMESTAMP_TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), WEEK(MONDAY)) - INTERVAL 1 DAY), INTERVAL 0 DAY) as sunday)"
  WHEN "Letzte 7 Tage" THEN " EXTRACT(date from time) >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY)"
  WHEN "Letzte 30 Tage" THEN " EXTRACT(date from time) >=  DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL  30 DAY) "
  END

SELECT 
  CASE "${Zeitraum:text}"
  WHEN "Letzte Stunde" 
    THEN "_last_hour_app"
  ELSE ""
END

SELECT 
  CASE "${Zeitraum:text}"
  WHEN "Letzte Stunde" 
    THEN "_last_2_hour_app"
  ELSE ""
END

SELECT 
CASE '${App}'
  WHEN "MDR AKTUELL" THEN 'CONTAINS_SUBSTR(bi_av_url, "mdrde.nachrichten.app_aktuell")'
  WHEN "MDR JUMP" THEN 'CONTAINS_SUBSTR(bi_av_url, "jump.jump.app_jump.")'
  WHEN "MDR Kultur" THEN 'CONTAINS_SUBSTR(bi_av_url, "mdrde.kultur.app_kultur")'
  WHEN "MDR Sachsen" THEN 'bi_av_page_chapter1 = "nachrichten" AND CONTAINS_SUBSTR(bi_av_url, "app") AND bi_av_page_chapter2 = "sachsen"'
  WHEN "MDR Sachsen-Anhalt" THEN  'bi_av_page_chapter1 = "nachrichten" AND CONTAINS_SUBSTR(bi_av_url, "app") AND bi_av_page_chapter2 = "sachsen-anhalt"'
  WHEN "MDR Serbja" THEN 'CONTAINS_SUBSTR(bi_av_url, "mdrde.serbski-program.app_serbj")'
  WHEN "Sport im Osten" THEN 'CONTAINS_SUBSTR(bi_av_url, "mdrde.sport.app_sport")'
  WHEN "MDR Audio" THEN 'CONTAINS_SUBSTR(bi_av_url, "mdrde.barrierefreiheit.app_audio")'
  WHEN "MDR Thüringen" THEN
'bi_av_page_chapter1 = "nachrichten" AND CONTAINS_SUBSTR(bi_av_url, "app") AND bi_av_page_chapter2 = "thueringen"'
  ELSE "site_level2 = '${app_name}'"
END

SELECT 
CASE "${Zeitraum:text}"
  WHEN "Heute" THEN  "Piano.av_joined_today"
  WHEN "Heute -7d" THEN  "Piano.av_joined_today"
  WHEN "Letzte Stunde" THEN "Piano.av_joined_last_hour"
  ELSE "Piano.av_joined_daily"
  END

SELECT 
CASE "${Zeitraum:text}"
  WHEN "Letzte Stunde" THEN "Piano.av_last_2_hour"
  ELSE "Piano.av_joined_daily"
  END

SELECT CASE "$LRA"
        WHEN "MDR" THEN """(av_content_type = "video" OR av_content_type = "Video")"""
        WHEN "NDR" THEN """(objekt_typ = "video" OR objekt_typ = "Video")"""
        END

SELECT CASE "$LRA"
        WHEN "MDR" THEN """(av_content_type = "audio" OR av_content_type = "Audio")"""
        WHEN "NDR" THEN """(objekt_typ = "audio" OR objekt_typ = "Audio")"""
        END

SELECT CASE "$LRA"
        WHEN "MDR" THEN """bi_av_publication_date"""
        WHEN "NDR" THEN """content_last_editoral_update"""
        END

SELECT CASE "$LRA"
        WHEN "MDR" THEN """bi_av_content_id"""
        WHEN "NDR" THEN """content_id_sophora"""
        END

SELECT CASE "$LRA"
        WHEN "MDR" THEN """bi_av_content"""
        WHEN "NDR" THEN """content_titel"""
        END

SELECT CASE "$LRA"
        WHEN "MDR" THEN """("ondemand") """
        WHEN "NDR" THEN """("video","audio","podcast") """
        END

SELECT CASE "$LRA"
        WHEN "MDR" THEN """("live") """
        WHEN "NDR" THEN """("audioLivestream","videoLivestream","videoEventlivestream") """
        END
